rules: Modals should always appear centered on the page
Overlay should cover the entire viewport with subtle opacity
Content padding is 16px on all sides except bottom bar buttons (top/bottom 12px, left/right 16px)
Max width defaults to 480px, or 80% if content is a table
Max height auto, or 80vh if content is a table or very tall content
Top title bar includes a title and a cross icon, with bottom border using #DCDFE6
Bottom navigation bar contains action buttons, top border #DCDFE6
Action buttons in bottom bar are height 32px, spaced 12px apart, aligned to the right
Content lives between the title bar and bottom bar
Use white background with subtle shadow (shadows.default)
Keep modals concise; avoid unnecessary decoration
